doc.after: The main public transportation system in Novi Sad consists of bus lines. In urban part of Novi Sad and Petrovaradin there are 17 bus lines, as well as 33 lines which connect villages and towns in Novi Sad and Petrovaradin municipalities, but also villages and towns in surrounding municipalities of BeoÄin, Temerin and Sremski Karlovci. Bus transportation is operated by JGSP Novi Sad.
